Package srg.ship

Class Room

java.lang.Object
srg.ship.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Damageable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CargoHold, NavigationRoom
public class Room extends Object implements Damageable
Represents a Room in a Ship. Rooms are Damageable objects. Rooms also have a tier which contributes to determining starting health and damage rate.
Version:
1.2

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface srg.ship.Damageable

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(RoomTier tier)
      Constructs a Room and assigns it a tier. The following class variables have default values:
      • damageRate is determined by the Room's tier and Damageable's DAMAGE_RATE.
      • health is initially determined by the Room's tier and Damageable's HEALTH_MULTIPLIER.
      • maxHealth is determined by the Room's tier and Damageable's HEALTH_MULTIPLIER.
      Parameters:
      tier - The Room's quality tier.

    • Room

      public Room()
      Constructs a Room and autoamtically assigns it a BASIC tier.

  • Method Details

    • upgrade

      public void upgrade()
      Upgrades a Room based on its current tier.

      public int getHealth()
      Get the health as an integer percentage of the maximum.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      An integer representing the current health as a percentage of the maximum, rounded down.

    • getActions

      public List<String> getActions()
      Get the list of actions that it is possible to perform from this Room. Generic Rooms have no actions.
      Returns:
      A List of actions that are unique to this SpacePort as Strings.
